survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Indoor Climbing Gyms
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from members and visitors of indoor climbing gyms to understand their satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and enhance overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit this indoor climbing gym in a typical month?
